Translations.Text: Nandao ta bu zhidao ma? Dang fenmu zhong de yiqie bei jielu [siren bei fuhuo],
[ren] xiongzhong de yiqie bei xianlu shi,
zai na ri [fuhuo ri], tamen de zhu que shi che zhi tamen de [gongguo de].
Da nan [fuhuo ri].
Da nan shi shenme?
Ni zen neng zhidao da nan shi shenme?
Zai na ri, renlei jiang xiang sanluan de fei e,
qun shan jiang xiang shuguo de rongmao.
Zhiyu shangong zhong zhe,
ta jiang huode yukuai de shenghuo [leyuan];
zhiyu shangong qing zhe,
shen keng [huo yu] jiang shi ta de guisu.
Ni zen neng zhidao shen keng shi shenme?
Na shi ranshaozhe de liehuo.
[Jinshi] jingxiang zhuizhu mingli yi shi nimen shuhu [luxing zongjiao gongxiu],
zhidao nimen qu jian fenmu.
Bu, nimen bujiu jiang zhidao;
bu, nimen bujiu jiang zhidao;
bu, jiaru nimen zhidao zhenshi de zhishi [jingxiang zhuizhu mingli de houguo, nimen biding tingzhile].
Nimen bi jiang kanjian huo yu.
Ranhou, nimen bi jiang qinyan kanjian ta;
ranhou, zai na ri, nimen bi jiang bei shenwen [nimen zai chenshi suo xiangshou de] enhui.
Yi shiguang fashi,
renlei que shi zai sunshi zhong,
wei xinyang, xingshan, yi zhenli quanmian, yi jianren hu li zhe liwai.
Mei ge feibang zhe, zaoyao zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Ta [feibang zhe, zaoyao zhe] juji caifu bing [jingchang] jisuan,
ta renwei ta de caifu neng shi ta yongsheng [zhu].
Jue bu keneng! Ta bi jiang bei touru huimie zhi keng zhong.
Ni zen neng zhidao huimie zhi keng shi shenme?
Na shi an la de ranshaozhe de liehuo,
ta neng shao ru [ren de] xinli.
Tamen bi jiang bei guanbi zai qizhong,
bei kun zai zhang zhu shang shaozhuo.

Nandao ni [mu sheng] bu zhidao ni de zhu [an la] shi zenyang chengzhi xiang de zhurenmen ma?[Gongyuan 570 nian, ji mu shengdan sheng na nian, yemen zongdu ai bu la ha•ai shen la mu shuailing xiang jun xiang mai jia jinfa, qitu cuihui ke er baitian fang, hou bei yi zhong chuanran bing suo mie.]
Nandao ta [an la] meiyou shi tamen de jimou shibai ma?
Ta ceng paiqian cheng qun de niao qu xiji tamen,
naxie niao yong niantu ban de shi kuai sheji tamen,
shi tamen bian chengle xiang chi sheng de cao geng yiyang.
Weile baohu gu lai shen ren,
weile baohu tamen [de shang dui] dongji [ping'an daoda nanfang] he xiaji [ping'an daoda beifang] de luxing,
jiao tamen chongbai zhe zuo tian fang de zhu [an la].
Shi ta [an la] zai ji'e shi ci gei tamen shiwu, zai kongju shi ci gei tamen anning.
Ni kanjian fouren shenpan ri de ren ma?
Na jiushi chizhu gu'er,
bu mianli jieji [zhu] pinmin zhe.
[Wei xin de] libai zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Tamen shi hushi ziji de bai gong de,
tamen [de libai] shi gumingdiaoyu de,
tamen jujue zuo renhe shanshi [ru jie ren guo, wan, piao, pen deng riyongpin].
Wo que yi ci ni [mu sheng] duo fu [zhu] [huo leyuan li yitiao ming wei “kao sai er” de he],
suoyi, ni dang wei ni de zhu libai bing [wei ta] zaisheng.
Rang ni fennu de ren que shi juehou de [jinshi he houshi jie wu fu fen].
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Bu xinyang zhe a!
Wo bu chongbai nimen suo chongbai de,
nimen ye bu chongbai wo suo chongbai de;
wo bu hui chongbai nimen suo chongbai de,
nimen ye bu hui chongbai wo suo chongbai de.
Nimen you nimen de zongjiao, wo you wo de zongjiao [yisilan jiao].”
Dang an la de yuanzhu [ji yuanzhu mu sheng zhansheng diren] he shengli [gongke mai jia] lailin,
ni kanjian renmen cheng qun jie dui gui xin'an la de zongjiao [yisilan jiao] shi,
ni dang zanmei songyang ni de zhu [an la], dang qiu ta [an la] kuanshu. Ta que shi jieshou huiguo de.
Ai bu•la he bu [zhu] [yi ji huoyan zhi fu, shi mu sheng de yi wei shufu] de shuangshou jiangyao bei huimie, ta ye jiang bei huimie.
Ta de caifu he tasuo huode de [ru ernu] jiang dui ta hao wu yichu.
Ta jiang jinru you yan de liehuo [zhong shaozhuo],
ta de ban chai de qizi [ta chang zai mu sheng jingguo de lushang bushe jian ci, daochu feibang mu sheng] ye jiang jinru [you yan de liehuo zhong shaozhuo],
ta de bozi shang shuanzhe yi gen jieshi de zonglu sheng.
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Ta shi an la, shi du yi de zhu [zhu].
An la shi wu suo qiu de, shi wanwu suo xuqiu de.
Ta bu sheng [er] yu [nu], ye bu [shi] bei shengyu [de].
Jue meiyou renhe wu neng zuo ta de pidi [zhu].”
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo qiu shuguang zhi zhu [an la] baohu [zhu],
mian zao ta de chuangzao wu de shanghai,
mian zao heiye longzhao shi de shanghai,
mian zao chui kai [sheng] jie zhe de [moli de] shanghai,
mian zao jidu zhe jidu shi de shanghai.”
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo qiurenlei de zhu [an la],
renlei de zhangquan zhe [zhu][an la],
renlei ying chongbai de zhu [an la] baohu,
mian zao qianfu de jiaosuo zhe de shanghai [zhu].
Ta [jiaosuo zhe] zai renlei de xinzhong jiaosuo [zuo huaishi],
ta laizi jingling he ren lei.”
